original_text: And the ass saw the angel of the Lord standing in the way, and his sword drawn in his hand: and the ass turned aside out of the way, and went into the field: and Balaam smote the ass, to turn her into the way.
korean_text: 나귀가 여호와의 사자가 칼을 빼어 손에 들고 길에 선 것을 보고 길에서 벗어나 밭으로 들어간지라 발람이 나귀를 길로 돌이키려고 채찍질하니

sentences.original_text: And the ass saw the angel of the Lord
and his sword drawn in his hand:
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 손에 칼을 뽑아 든 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: and the ass turned aside out of the way
to turn her into the way.
sentences.korean_translation: 나귀를 다시 길로 돌아오게 하기 위해
